name: Monster Match (Imilkowski Dev, bitcrush_games, MoaOrLess, jorest)
name_original: Monster Match (Imilkowski Dev, bitcrush_games, MoaOrLess, jorest)
description:
The Good Witch Tinda needs power - and what is more powerful than love?

Pair up the monsters - your crystal ball will foretell which pairs are true love - by looping them with your broomstick! 

But act fast - the monsters will leave by daybreak!

DON'T PRESS K ;)
